DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; FINDING THEIR NICHE
DOC.TEXT: For those keeping score , Sweden is 2-0 in penalty shot games in major sports events this year . The Swedish Olympic hockey_team outdueled Canada in penalty shots to win the gold medal at Lillehammer in February . And Sunday , the Swedish soccer team defeated Romania in a quarterfinal matchup . HELENE ELLIOTT
